[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@stabilio/lib-base](./lib-base.md) &gt; [TransactableStabilio](./lib-base.transactablestabilio.md) &gt; [redeemXBRL](./lib-base.transactablestabilio.redeemxbrl.md)

## TransactableStabilio.redeemXBRL() method

Redeem XBRL to native currency (e.g. Ether) at face value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
redeemXBRL(amount: Decimalish, maxRedemptionRate?: Decimalish): Promise<RedemptionDetails>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of XBRL to be redeemed. |
|  maxRedemptionRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum acceptable [redemption rate](./lib-base.fees.redemptionrate.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[RedemptionDetails](./lib-base.redemptiondetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

If `maxRedemptionRate` is omitted, the current redemption rate (based on `amount`<!-- -->) plus 0.1% is used as maximum acceptable rate.
